en.name: HK G3 7.62x51 assault rifle
en.description: The Heckler & Koch G3 (German: Gewehr 3) is a select-fire battle rifle chambered in 7.62x51mm NATO developed in the 1950s by the German firearms manufacturer Heckler & Koch, in collaboration with the Spanish state-owned firearms manufacturer CETME. The G3 was the service rifle of the German Bundeswehr until it was replaced by the Heckler & Koch G36 in the 1990s, and was adopted into service with numerous other countries. The G3 has been exported to over 70 countries and manufactured under license in at least 15 countries.

en.name: HK HK11E 7.62x51 light machine gun
en.description: The HK21 is a German 7.62x51mm general-purpose machine gun, developed in 1961 by small arms manufacturer Heckler & Koch and based on the G3 battle rifle. The weapon is in use with the armed forces of several Asian, African and Latin American countries. During the 1980s both the HK21A1 and HK11A1 were modernized based on user and testing feedback, resulting in a new modular family of machine guns that share the same receiver, trigger group and interchangeable barrels and feed units. The HK11A1 proved more successful in export sales and was adopted by the Hellenic Army and several African and Asian armies.

en.name: HK G3 20-round magazine
en.description: A standard 20-round 7.62x51 NATO magazine for the Heckler & Koch G3 assault rifle.

en.name: HK G3 30-round magazine
en.description: A standard 30-round 7.62x51 NATO magazine for the Heckler & Koch G3 assault rifle.

en.name: HK11E 7.62x51 50-round Drum Magazine
en.description: A standard 50-round 7.62x51 NATO drum magazine for the Heckler & Koch HK11E light machine gun.

en.name: HK G3 7.62x51 17.7 inch barrel
en.description: A 17.7 inch (450mm) long barrel for the Heckler & Koch G3 7.62x51 series of firearms.

en.name: HK PSG-1 7.62x51 20 inch barrel
en.description: A 20 inch (510mm) long barrel for the Heckler & Koch PSG-1 7.62x51 series of firearms.

en.name: HK HK11E 7.62x51 15 inch barrel
en.description: A 15 inch (127mm) long barrel for the Heckler & Koch HK11E 7.62x51 light machine gun.

en.name: HK G3K 7.62x51 12.4 inch barrel
en.description: An 12.4 inch (315mm) long barrel for the Heckler & Koch G3K 7.62x51 series of firearms.

en.name: HK G3K  7.62x51 11 inch barrel
en.description: An 11 inch (280mm) long barrel for the Heckler & Koch G3K 7.62x51 series of firearms.

en.name: HK G3SD custom handguard and barrel assembly
en.description: A handguard and barrel for the G3 assault rifle, manufactured by Heckler & Koch. It is specifically designed to work with the G3 integral suppressor.

en.name: HK G3 MCS Swordfish compensated barrel and rail system
en.description: A custom-compensated barrel and rail system for the Heckler & Koch G3K 7.62x51 series of firearms. Manufactured by Modern Combat Sports.

en.name: HK G3SD integrated sound suppressor
en.description: A standard G3SD integral sound suppressor manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

en.name: PTR G3 polymer handguard
en.description: The PTR polymer handguard is designed for the Heckler & Koch G3 weapon series. For over 15 years, PTR has been on a slow, steady march toward the goal of making the most reliable and accurate roller-lock weapons in the world. Through precision manufacturing, and an unwavering commitment to quality we are committed to providing the very best overall experience to all who use our products.

en.name: PTR G3 polymer handguard (OD)
en.description: The PTR polymer handguard is designed for the Heckler & Koch G3 weapon series. For over 15 years, PTR has been on a slow, steady march toward the goal of making the most reliable and accurate roller-lock weapons in the world. Through precision manufacturing, and an unwavering commitment to quality we are committed to providing the very best overall experience to all who use our products. Olive Drab version.

en.name: HK G3 Aim Sports extended M-LOK handguard
en.description: The Aim Sports HK G3 M-LOK extended handguard rail adapter allows you to install additional M-LOK attachments on the HK G3 weapon series.

en.name: HK G3K wooden handguard
en.description: The standard hand-crafted wood handguard for the Heckler & Koch G3K weapon series.

en.name: HK G3K polymer handguard (OD)
en.description: The standard polymer handguard for the Heckler & Koch G3K weapon series. Olive Drab version.

en.name: HK PSG-1 polymer handguard
en.description: The standard PSG-1 polymer conversion handguard designed for the Heckler & Koch G3 weapon series. This features a custom-mounted rail for installation of foregrips and tactical devices.

en.name: HK G3K Aim Sports Tri-Rail picatinny handguard
en.description: A triple rail handguard for Heckler & Koch G3K rifles, manufactured by Aim Sports. Equipped with 3 picatinny rail mounts for installation of additional devices and accessories.

en.name: HK G3 Aim Sports Tri-Rail picatinny handguard
en.description: A triple rail handguard for Heckler & Koch G3 rifles, manufactured by Aim Sports. Equipped with 3 picatinny rail mounts for installation of additional devices and accessories.

en.name: HK G3 M-LOK handguard
en.description: HK G3 Low Profile M-LOK Handguard for Heckler & Koch G3 rifles, manufactured by Heckler & Koch Parts in Utah. Designed from the ground up by roller lock & HK enthusiasts with your shooting needs & requirements in mind. This is simply the most rock solid, lightest forearm available. Our modular hand guard will give your firearm the finest level of versatility & function.

en.name: HK G3 Spuhr style handguard
en.description: HK G3 Spuhr Handguard for Heckler & Koch G3 rifles, manufactured by Spuhr i Dalby AB in Sweden. Lightweight slim profile aluminum handguard for Heckler & Koch G3 7.62x51 series of firearms. Made from single billet of 7075 T651.

en.name: HK G3 B&T NAR low-profile handguard
en.description: A modular aluminum handguard designed for Heckler & Koch G3 7.62x51 series of firearms, manufactured by B&T USA.

en.name: HK HK11E ported aluminum handguard
en.description: The Heckler & Koch ported handguard was designed for the HK11E light machine gun weapon series. It features a port on one side of the handguard to allow for better ventilation on the barrel during operation.

en.name: PTR G3 fixed buttstock assembly
en.description: A standard fixed stock designed for the HK G3 series firearm series, manufactured by PTR.

en.name: PTR G3 fixed buttstock assembly (OD)
en.description: A standard fixed stock designed for the HK G3 series firearm series, manufactured by PTR. Olive Drab version.

en.name: HK G3 custom wooden fixed buttstock assembly
en.description: A handcrafted wood fixed stock designed for the HK G3 series firearm series.

en.name: HK G3GSG-1 Fixed Stock
en.description: A polymer fixed stock, designed for the Heckler & Koch G3GSG-1 series of firearms.

en.name: HKG3A4 aluminum retractable stock
en.description: An aluminum retractable stock adapter, designed for the Heckler & Koch G3A4 firearm series.

en.name: HK PSG-1 fixed stock
en.description: A polymer fixed stock, designed to convert the Heckler & Koch G3 into a PSG-1 designated marksman series of firearms.

en.name: HK HK11E polymer fixed stock
en.description: A standard fixed stock, designed for the 11E light machinegun series. Manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

en.name: HK G3 buffer tube stock adapter
en.description: A stock adapter, designed for the Heckler & Koch G3-series weapons to mount buffer-tube style stocks.

en.name: HK G3 Spuhr R-410 buffer adapter
en.description: The R-410 G3 Stock Assembly brings the venerable HK G3 platform into the 22nd century, providing it with better handling and recoil management. Manufactured by Spuhr i Dalby AB in Sweden.

en.name: HK G3 Spuhr R-410 Stock
en.description: The R-410 G3 Stock Assembly brings the venerable HK G3 platform into the 22nd century, providing it with better handling and recoil management. Manufactured by Spuhr i Dalby AB in Sweden.

en.name: HK G3 B&T MBT adjustable stock
en.description: A modular polymer stock, designed for the Heckler & Koch G3 series of firearms. Manufactured by Brugger & Thomet.

en.name: HKG3 polymer pistol grip
en.description: A polymer pistol grip designed for the G3-series weapons, manufactured by Heckler & Koch.

en.name: HK G3 polymer pistol grip (OD)
en.description: A polymer pistol grip designed for the G3-series weapons, manufactured by Heckler & Koch. Olive Drab version.

en.name: HK PSG-1 DMR wooden pistol grip
en.description: A handcrafted wood pistol grip designed for the HK G3-series weapons to convert it into a PSG-1 designated marksman rifle.

en.name: HKG3 aluminum claw scope mount
en.description: A standard-issue picatinny claw mount, designed for the G3-series weapons. Manufacted by Heckler & Koch.

en.name: HKG3 aluminum claw low-profile scope mount
en.description: A low-profile picatinny claw mount, designed for the G3-series weapons. Manufacted by Heckler & Koch.

en.name: HK G3 drum rear sight
en.description: A standard rear drum iron sight, designed for the G3 series. Manufacted by Heckler & Koch.
